body_html: Also, you're not doing gradcheck(ConvNd(20, 12, 4), ...) right? It's not valid you should never reuse a Function object. This is correct: gradcheck(lambda input: ConvNd(20, 12, 4)(input), ...).
body_text: Also, you're not doing gradcheck(ConvNd(20, 12, 4), ...) right? It's not valid you should never reuse a Function object. This is correct: gradcheck(lambda input: ConvNd(20, 12, 4)(input), ...).
body: Also, you're not doing `gradcheck(ConvNd(20, 12, 4), ...)` right? It's not valid you should never reuse a Function object. This is correct: `gradcheck(lambda input: ConvNd(20, 12, 4)(input), ...)`.
